name: Wordz
description:
A RETRO TYPING ZOMBIE GAME FOR TEST KEYBOARDS, PRACTICE TYPING AND GET YOUR HIGH SCORE!

72 WORDS IN TOTAL RELATED TO THE ZOMBIE APOCALYPSE

3 SPECIALS WORDS BONUS | SLOW | BOMB
3 LEVELS OF DIFFICULTY EASY | NORMAL | HARD
2 STYLES SOUNDS FOR TYPING RETRO | BLUE SWITCHES

NEW UPDATES WILL COME POSSIBLY ;)
